sentences.en: By filing a joint application with the assignee with the Trademark Office.
sentences.cn: 你可以和授权人共同向商标局提出申请.

sentences.en: Clint Eastwood's trademark is his squint.
sentences.cn: (西部片影星)克林伊斯威特的特征是他眯眯眼.

sentences.en: Do you handle cases of patent and trademark infringement?
sentences.cn: 你们受理专利和商标侵权的案件 吗 ?

sentences.en: Ford allowed the name and trademark to lapse during the Eighties.
sentences.cn: 福特在20世纪80年代废止了该名称和商标。

sentences.en: It examines the application, issues preliminary approval and publishes the trademark.
sentences.cn: 申请注册的商标由商标局审查, 初步审定后,予以公告.

sentences.en: Naturally. Now , what do you do if you find somebody infringing your trademark?
sentences.cn: 那当然. 如果发现有人侵犯商标专用权怎么办?

sentences.en: Selling deliberately a commodity whose registered trademark is falsely used may constitute a crime.
sentences.cn: 销售明知是假冒注册商标的商品可构成犯罪.

sentences.en: She has registered a trademark for a new range of perfumes.
sentences.cn: 她已为一个新系列的香水注册了商标。

sentences.en: The striped T-shirt became the comedian’s trademark.
sentences.cn: 条纹T恤衫成了这位喜剧演员的标记。

sentences.en: The trademark is registered on the book of the Patent Office.
sentences.cn: 该商标已在专利局登记注册.

sentences.en: The trademark of the pen was changed.
The Trademark Office, of course, gives precedence to the person who files first.
sentences.cn: 商标局对申请在先的自然予以优先.

sentences.en: They've been working in the area of trademark for 30 years for our foreign friends.
sentences.cn: 他们为外国朋友办理商标事宜已有30年了.

sentences.en: Yes, unless the same trademark is also registered in this country.
sentences.cn: 对, 除非同一商标也在另一国注册.

sentences.en: Yes. They will apply for the registration of your trademark.
sentences.cn: 是的,他们可以代你申请商标注册.

sentences.en: You mean the procedures for trademark examination, don't you?
sentences.cn: 你指的是商标的注册程序, 对 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 商标,标记,记号,徽章,标语

phrases.tran_cn: 商标侵权；侵犯商标专用权

trans.tran_cn: （注册）商标，（人的行为或衣着的）特征，标记
trans.tran_en: a special name, sign, or word that is marked on a product to show that it is made by a particular company, that cannot be used by any other company
